sentences.en: Palm Springs has ritzy restaurants and glitzy nightlife.

sentences.en: Nevada now needs humdrum jobs more than glitzy casinos.
sentences.cn: 内华达眼下更需要普通的就业岗位而不是光彩夺目的赌场。

sentences.en: This caused some glitzy malls to close and vexed shoppers.
sentences.cn: 这次行动迫使一些大型购物商场关闭，令购物者感到恼火。
